src:
경주 감포 앞바다서 부부 탄 어선 전복…60대 선장 실종
선장 부인은 구조돼 병원 이송
02 Nov 2019, 01:48 by (경주=뉴스1) 최창호 기자


2일 오전 3시39분쯤 경북 경주시 감포 동방 3.7km해상에서 통발 어선 A호(4.43톤)가 전복돼 배에 타고 있던 선장 B씨(60)이 실종됐다. (포항해양경찰서제공) 2019.11.2/© 뉴스1

2일 오전 3시39분쯤 경북 경주시의 감포 동쪽 3.7km 해상에서 조업 중이던 4.43톤 통발어선 A호가 전복돼 선장 B씨(60)가 실종됐다.사고 어선에는 선장 부부가 타고 있었다. 신고를 받고 출동한 포항해경은 어선 부의를 붙잡고 있던 B씨의 부인 C씨(54)를 구조해 병원으로 이송했다. C씨는 생명에 지장이 없는 것으로 알려졌다.해경은 사고 해역에 함정과 헬기 등을 투입해 수색활동을 벌이고 있다. choi119@news1.kr
text:
Couples fishing boats overturned off Gyeongju Gampo… Captain 60s missing
The captain's wife is rescued.
02 Nov 2019, 01:48 by (Gyeongju = News1) Reporter Choi Chang-ho


At about 3:39 am on the 2nd, Captain B (60), who was on board, disappeared when fishing boat A (4.43 tons) was overturned 3.7km east of Gampo, Gyeongju, Gyeongbuk. (Pohang Maritime Police Office) 2019.11.2 / © News1

On March 2, at 3:39 am, the 4.43 ton fishing boat A, which was operating at 3.7 km east of Gimpo, Gyeongju, Korea, was overturned and Captain B (60) was missing. Pohang, a police officer, was rescued and rescued Mr. B's wife, C, 54, who was holding a fishing boat and transported it to a hospital. Mr. C is known to have no problems in life, and the police are conducting search activities by introducing traps and helicopters into the waters of the accident. choi119@news1.kr
